definition: old name for Shanghai 上海[Shang4 hai3]/surname Shen
to extend/to state/to explain/9th earthly branch: 3-5 p.m., 7th solar month (7th August-7th September), year of the Monkey/ancient Chinese compass point: 240°
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request

sentences.english: Whether to apply to any other CIML Member for a certificate?
sentences.chinese: 是否向其它國家的CIML委員有過申請？

sentences.english: Here are the slips for blood test and fluoroscopic examination.
sentences.chinese: 這些是化驗血和做胸透的申請單。

sentences.english: Applicants should not be receiving any other bursary schemes.
sentences.chinese: 申請者不應是其他助學金計劃的領受者。

sentences.english: A transferee who is dissatisfied with such an order may apply for review not more than once.
sentences.chinese: 受讓人對裁定不服的，可以申請複議一次。

sentences.english: Factor in all the schools you’re applying to and any back-up options.
sentences.chinese: 考慮你所有申請的學校和後備選擇。

sentences.english: They will allocate funds to you if you requisition it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你提出書面申請，他們就會撥給你資金。

sentences.english: CCS will not be liable for any loss due to any error of the applicant or any other person.
sentences.chinese: 本社對因申請方或他人的過錯造成的損失不負責。

sentences.english: Form-filling guides and the required courses for specialization could be found in the application form.
sentences.chinese: 填表說明及專業方向對應課程詳見申請表。

sentences.english: Great, because I'm applying for my driver's license
sentences.chinese: 太好了，因爲我在申請駕照。

sentences.english: Anyone who loses his resident identity card shall apply for reissue of a card.
sentences.chinese: 居民身份證丟失的，應當申請補領。

sentences.english: Some research findings have applied for national patent.
sentences.chinese: 主要研究成果已申請國家專利。

sentences.english: The loan money will be used in the inner decoration.
sentences.chinese: 申請的貸款將用於室內裝潢。

sentences.english: Only shortlisted applicants will be contacted for further assessment.
sentences.chinese: 本局只會聯絡初步入選的申請人作進一步評覈。

sentences.english: Applications will be processed on a first-come, first-served basis.
sentences.chinese: 全部營舍均以先到先得方式接受申請。

sentences.english: AWE's data-based applications are the next generation of wireless communication and services.
sentences.chinese: 敬畏的數據庫申請是無線溝通的下代和服務。

sentences.english: The applicant for supervisory unit qualification shall submit the following documents to the SMCAC.
sentences.chinese: 申請監理單位資質，應當向市建委提供下列材料。

definition: to present/to give/to hand over/to hand in/to lay before
plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
to report (to the authorities)/to declare (to customs)
